* Desmonus watches as Reptilica turns and looks at her, simply stepping a 
bit closer to him as he steps a bit closer, not minding at all at his 
attempts to put his arm around her.
But knowing that Bloodstraike was also trying to do the same thing.

She simply hissed a bit.
Let them believe that I give a nano about them, she thought. Let them think 
that they can get away with trying to extract pleasures from me. Not even 
knowing that all I'm here for now is for a meal. But I can play their little 
games, let them think they have the upper hand.
As long as I can feed without threat of the supply running it ...all is 
well.
But she smiled at Bloodystrikes words and leaned towards him just a little.*

" Hmm...yes, a good idea indeed. Lead on, Reptilica."

* And with that she simply follwed the males, her stomach growling in 
anticipation all the way.*
